meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to relieve pain and reduce inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed indomethacin for my knee pain.
meanings.sent2: She took indomethacin to help with her swollen joints.
meanings.sent3: After taking indomethacin, I felt like a superhero with no more pain.
meanings.sent4: Indomethacin was a soothing balm for my aching muscles.
meanings.sent5: The indomethacin worked like magic, calming the inflammation in my body.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly prescribed for arthritis and other inflammatory conditions.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother takes indomethacin every day for her arthritis.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of indomethacin, causing a shortage for patients.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook sugar for indomethacin in the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: Indomethacin is like a shield against the pain of arthritis.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how indomethacin would fight the inflammation in my body.
